name: WORMHOLES n' chill
description:
Ever want to chill n' drop some wormholes? You've come to the the right place.

This is a game about herding people to a goal with the power of portals. Place wormholes to disable force fields, launch people, and more! What else could you want from a game?

Controls:

 - Right click to place the input portal, left click to place the output portal.

 - Drag to rotate the camera around the environment.
